tool_description: A horoscope API for all purpose
title: Devbrewer Horoscope

api_list.name: This Month Short
api_list.description: A short horoscope for the current month
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://devbrewer-horoscope.p.rapidapi.com/month/short/{sign}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "devbrewer-horoscope.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Love Match
api_list.description: Describes the love match between two signs
